notes: USA-based DIY cosmetics supplier offering Squalane 107 (100% plant-based, sugarcane-derived) for professional and DIY formulators. Applications: Prevents moisture loss, restores skin suppleness, lightweight hydration. Biomimetic properties as it naturally occurs in skin lipids. Mid-range pricing ($50-75/kg) with small to medium quantities (50g-5kg) and multiple size options. USA-based distribution with international shipping. Technical data sheets and formulation guidance available. Ideal for indie brands and small-scale formulation.
